embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body: You sat for an hour without that patch moving forward anymore at all?! Snap that sucks, we could try closing that and starting it again to see if it just got hung up for some reason, but you could also try using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a quick **force repatch**.
